searchPlaceholder: Shakisha umutwe wi gitabo , umwanditsi cyangwa icyiciro
supportText: Twandikire kugirango tugufashe, kandi ikipe yacu izishimira kugufasha.
about: Precious Present Truth, Inc. (PPT) ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu ugizwe n’ababwirizabutumwa b’abalayiki b’Abadiventisiti b’Umunsi wa Karindwi biyemeje gusangiza Abanyafurika ubutumwa bw’Abamarayika Batatu. Turabwiriza ubutumwa bw’Abamarayika Batatu bwo mu Byahishuwe 14 tugera ku Banyafurika mu ndimi zabo kavukire binyuze mu itangazamakuru, ibitabo, n’ibiterane by’ubutumwa ku butaka. Twemera kandi dushyigikiye umugambi wa Konferansi Nkuru y’Abadiventisiti b’Umunsi wa Karindwi n’umushinga wayo wa Kwitabira Kwa Buri Munyamuryango (TMI) hamwe n'uwitwa Nanjye Nzagenda. I Kinshasa, Umurimo wa PPT ku bufatanye na Konferansi yaho, wakiriye ibiterane bibiri by’ubutumwa byayobowe n’ababwirizabutumwa mpuzamahanga bafite uburambe. Imana yahaye umugisha imirimo yacu, habatizwa abantu barenga 360.
